org.apache.mahout.math.hadoop.stochasticsvd

Class UJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mahout.math.hadoop.stochasticsvd.UJob

  • public class UJob
extends Object
    Computes U=Q*Uhat of SSVD (optionally adding x pow(Sigma, 0.5) )
